title: b00tleg Keen
content:
On Ebay, i've noticed some shyster's selling illegal "downloads" of Commander Keen...

[url=http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&category=62053&item=8202227896&rd=1&ssPageName=WDVW]cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI...eName=WDVW[/url]

You've have to be stupid to fall for that. Those gullible bidders should try the 3D Realms store. :/[img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]
